name: Main Street Hidden Gems Culinary Tour
description: Main Street may be one of the oldest neighbourhoods in the city but it is home to some of the youngest and hippest locals. Packed full of designer boutiques, funky thrift shops, and quirky restaurants, Vancouverites know that Main is the street to find the city’s best culinary hidden gems. Let us show you five of the very best spots we guarantee you wouldn’t find on your own!
